nml_option.name: config_sub_ice_shelf_2D_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in sub_ice_shelf_2D. Typical value is 22.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_sub_ice_shelf_2D_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean for the this test case.

nml_option.name: config_sub_ice_shelf_2D_cavity_thickness
nml_option.description: Vertical thickness of ocean sub-ice cavity.

nml_option.name: config_sub_ice_shelf_2D_edge_width
nml_option.description: Horizontal width of angled part of the ice.

nml_option.name: config_sub_ice_shelf_2D_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of the surface in the northern half of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_sub_ice_shelf_2D_surface_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.

nml_option.name: config_sub_ice_shelf_2D_bottom_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.
